perturbation.original_text: Each Party irrevocably agrees that the English courts shall have sole and exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim (including non-contractual disputes or claims) arising out of or in connection with this Amendment or its subject matter or formation.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party agrees that the English courts may have jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim (including non-contractual disputes or claims) arising out of or in connection with this Amendment or its subject matter or formation but will only be applicable if both parties agree.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause mandates that English courts have 'sole and exclusive jurisdiction.' The modified version changes this to permissive jurisdiction ('may have') contingent on mutual agreement. This introduces a legal contradiction because, in the original agreement, one party could unilaterally enforce jurisdiction in English courts but now, it requires agreement by both parties to have effect. This diminishes the enforceability and legal certainty of the jurisdiction clause.

perturbation.original_text: Each party will treat as confidential the Confidential Information of the other party and will take all necessary precautions to assure the confidentiality of such Confidential Information.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party will treat as confidential the Confidential Information of the other party if they deem it necessary to do so.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause clearly states that both parties will treat information as confidential. The new version states that they will treat it as confidential if they deem it necessary, removing the legally binding obligation.

perturbation.original_text: Fleet shall defend, indemnify and hold harmless Columbia, its Affiliates and their respective successors and permitted assigns (and the respective officers, directors, stockholders, partners and employees of each) from and against any and all losses liabilities, claims, actions, proceedings, damages and expenses (including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys' and professional fees and disbursements and expenses of litigation, arbitration or investigation) ("Damages") relating to or arising from (i) any breach by Fleet or its Affiliates of its representations, warranties, covenants, agreements or obligations under this Agreement, including without limitation, the failure of Fleet to timely deliver all Product ordered or the failure of the Product to meet the Fleet Warranty and/or Product Specifications or the failure of Fleet to manufacture or warehouse the Product in accordance with the Product Specifications and Applicable Law (including those relating to cGMP);
perturbation.changed_text: Fleet shall defend, indemnify and hold harmless Columbia, only when deemed appropriate by fleet's legal team.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that Fleet will defend, indemnify and hold harmless Columbia, its Affiliates and their respective successors and permitted assigns (and the respective officers, directors, stockholders, partners and employees of each). The new version states that Fleet will only do so if deemed appropriate by Fleet's legal team, giving Fleet the unilateral option of whether or not to indemnify the aforementioned parties.
